name: by Ylanni C.
review: Well packaged and it actually works in both my laptop and tablet. So happy with this purchase and it looks so nice.

name: by R***.
review: Been eyeing this for months, the lowest price I found for this unit and 100% legit with serial code. Thank you seller 🎉🎉🎉

name: by M***.
review: Really love the item! I appreciate that it was very well packed when it arrived. Worth the wait. Easy to install as well! Works well with my macbook air 2020.

name: by J***.
review: Wow grabe ang bilis magship!! Nung 12.12 ko lang to inorder tapos ngayong 12.13 nakuha ko na agad! Ganda ng quality. Okay naman ang packaging. Thank you

name: by D***.
review: It's my first time buying from Juan Gadget and they did not disappoint. From packaging to delivery, they did quite well. 👏 Items were nicely protected with layers of bubble wrap, cardboard, and fragile stickers (as what can be seen in the video) and they also shipped out the items immediately.  Both Logitech items are also legit (with proper Bluetooth names and free battery just like the Logitech mice and keyboards I got from malls) and more importantly, they are working perfectly. 👍

name: by Ylanni C.
review: Well packaged and it actually works in both my laptop and tablet. So happy with this purchase and it looks so nice.

review: Been eyeing this for months, the lowest price I found for this unit and 100% legit with serial code. Thank you seller 🎉🎉🎉

name: by A***.
review: the item was packed safely and it was delivered to me after one day that it was shipped by the seller. thank you!

name: by ********066
review: Okay naman, sound on para ma feel niyo kung pano yung Tunog ng keyboard hehehehe maaga da siya, smooth lang. nag base lang din ako sa review nagandahan ako.

name: by C***.
review: The item was delivered very fast and was neatly packed. Arrived in excellent condition as well - no dents, broken keys, or scratches on the keyboard. Also came with free batteries which I highly appreciate. Will definitely recommend this shop to my friends!

name: by Mary A.
review: goodbye blue 380 hello pink 🥰😍🤩

name: by Peter C.
review: Thanks for the very fast delivery! My items arrived in perfect condition. They were packaged well and may invoice pang kasama. Thank you seller!

name: by Maria R.
review: Got First time ordering from this store but definitely 💯 legit product. Price is also definitely cheaper than most sellers. Kudos to the seller for a smooth transaction and fast delivery. Very satisfied customer here. Highly  recommended seller. Thank you very much!

name: by R***.
review:
Logitech is a trusted brand for PC peripherals.

I'm just glad that this store delivered. ✨

name: by R***.
review: Thanks seller, ang bilis naship! Super secured din yung balot. Ganda ng keyboard, easy to connect and transfer sa 3 devices :) kamsahamnida!

name: by M***.
review: Excellent quality for a very reasonable price. The shipping is likewise very fast. Thank you very much, seller.

name: by M***.
review: nice powh, ganda ng white....

name: by 9***5
review: Lightweight and user friendly. Functions and responds well across different devices. Also comes with a warranty 😊

name: by Gerald A.
review: Really hesitant to buy but it was really good. No dents or damages to the product. They keyboard is really good and silent. It connects so easly to the laptop and the ipad. VERY Nice

name: by DJ C.
review: Compatible sa MacBook pro. Worth the price. No issue upon delivery and mala balik bayan package. Super compact and very easy to pair with iOS. Thanks!!

name: by D***.
review:
The product was shipped out immediately and well packaged 👏❤...........
............

name: by d***.
review: I've been using this for a few months now and super ganda niya pa rin! I like the sound of it. Not very maingay, sakto lang hehe

name: by Adora C.
review: thank u Seller! verfy fast shipping ordered 2.2 and arrived 2.4. also the keyboard is secured no damage and it is working right away. 😊

name: by F***.
review: Parcel was packed securely and delivered by J&T in pristine condition. Keyboard connected to my iPad right away. It came with batteries! The keys are so crisp and I love typing on this ❤️

name: by Pia A.
review: shipped in two days and in good working condition! sulit guys!

name: by ********378
review: Color is dusty nudish pink to align expectations. Easy to install in multiple devices. It is light so it is travel-friendly. No doubt it is pretty although practically it would take a little bit of getting used to with the round tabs and key positionings. It automatically goes to sleep mode so dont waste time looking for the off button. Only wish this keyboard had backlight and a trackpad but that is for Logitech to figure out haha. Good buy! Shipped quickly too! Thank you!

name: by Ramboy L.
review: Nice product with a very sleek design. The packaging’s nice too and was shipped on time. Must buy for those looking for a wireless keyboard

name: by Mitchell M.
review:
chic, portable, and hoping it's reliable. Will visit this review after sometime. 
♡ it connects to my laptop very easily and fast!

name: by E***a
review: Cute & convenient! perfect for remote working, bluetooth works fine and I love the color! #kakampink💖

name: by M***.
review:
♥️easy to connect Bluetooth

♥️small
♥️cute color and aesthetic 
♥️very secured packaging
♥️delivered fasf thanks JG

name: by R***.
review: Really like the keyboard. It works even with our smart TV. Product was packaged well too.

name: by B***.
review: works perfectly. lambot ng keys. easy in the eyes. received the item in good condition. legit!

name: by R***.
review: This product is so great i loved it i hope theres more product na ganito ka pulido loved it by miles

name: by K***.
review: it was well packaged n arrived in good condition. no damage, even the box!! thank u!!<3333

name: by Brando A.
review: Product is really good quality. I’m very happy with nmmmmmy purchase. Great product 5 stars for me

review: Cheaper than other sellers. Haven’t tried it yet since im waiting for the silicon cover to arrive. This is nice and very handy as well. Love this shade of pink too

name: by Alexander V.
review: The BT Keyboars works well but I doubt its authenticity. The branding located above the keyboard is  LOGI not the complete LOGITECH. I googled the product and the legit ones have LOGITECH printed on it.

name: by Elaine R.
review:
Not as good as the quality of my previous K380
Seller assured me this is original but it is not aa heavy as my old one. Space bar is squeaking when typing and keys tapping is not as crisp as expected. 

I am being bounced around by CSR and their tech team
Not too happy with this.

name: by Marc
review: this logitech k380 i think is fake! bakit may chinese characters tapos ung QR code napupunta sa website na hindi naka Up

name: by J***.
review: Not sure if this product is authentic ksi yung sa Logitech na official store iba ung packaging and walang Chinese characters na sulat pero yung dito meron.

name: by Benedict C.
review: Got the item with scratches

name: by Randee S.
review: Affordable items however I’m not satisfied with the service.  Especially nung 1st order ko after waiting too long bigla na lang kinansel for the reason na out-of-stock. Nacharged na sa account mo, super late na sa pagdeliver then biglang ikakansel nila

name: by J***.
review: Seller said: RETURN BECOZ BUYER IS NOT SATISFIED IS NOT A VALID REASON. Think twice bago kayo bumili dito.
